title: can some1 explain WHY supports need minion kills in order to S rank?
body:
i don't see any valid reason as to why as support you would need any minion kills whatsoever

i hardly see taking cs away from your adc as a good thing

if there is none..why has the requirement not been removed yet riot?

replies.body:
They dont.

Gold matters, CS by itself not so much. Focus on stacking those support items, upgrade first back if possible, and maybe try roaming during downtime and snagging some assists.

I've gotten S+'s on champions like Nami without taking CS.

Only supports where CS is important is {{item:3302}} supports like {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:14}}  {{champion:111}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:555}} {{champion:223}}

Sometimes I wonder. I always only get cs when I support if I’m last hitting and my adc is nowhere near. Trying to grind out Rakan to level 7 this preseason was nuts. I literally have screenshots of my journey through the grading system. I went 5/1/25 with like 70% KP and a 60+ vision score (vision was always something I prided myself on in any role) and I got an A+.... S grades often times make no sense as I got my final S token (never got an S+ once grinding him from 3-7 over a week) I had a significantly worse score but more cs so *shrug*

They don't? 

 You can easily get an S rank with a good vision score and good kill participation. Does it help to CS? Yes, and you should be snagging a few minions here and there, but not enough to hurt your ADC.

source: I'm a support main with a few M6/M7s

As a support player. Its my belief that if you don't last hit free cs, then  your trash  and/or  not being very efficient in your playing.

Oh this gold is going to be wasted. I better not push the lane by all of 30-60 hp on a minion. 

No adc? No jungle? No mid? No one besides me?  

Nah let me not get to my next item faster.

You know what helps my adc? When I finish a Tier 2 income item. When I can pick up a {{item:2055}} . When you complete {{item:3109}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3222}}  {{item:3050}} etc etc etc.

Free gold is good. Grab it when its there. If you don't then you hurt your teammates.

Your adc backed? You need to learn and know how to manage waves. How to freaze lane. As well as when to push to prevent the enemy bot from returning to a advantageous lane position. Deny their cs by feeding it into a tower.

You know, just basic mechanics.
